metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Ingredients: 1 pound beef tenderloin, 1/4 cup paprika, 2 tablespoons fenugreek, 1 tablespoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 cup coconut milk, water, turmeric, and salt to make a batter .
General Tso's Chicken is made from chicken cubes, chopped chicken thighs, chopped eggplants and ground lamb or beef . Greek Moussaka is made of eggplant, ground lamb and minced garlic .
Ingredients: Fettuccine, Shepherd's Pie, chicken, mashed potatoes, Parmesan cheese, minced garlic, chopped parsley, Worcestershire sauce, heavy cream, and beef broth .

Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking powder . 1 cup milk, 1 cup vegetable oil and 1 cup fresh or frozen berries . Ingredients: 6 eggs, 2 cups of marinara sauce, 2 cup shredded cheese, shredded cheese . 6 large eggs, 6 slices of sausage or bacon, 2 slices of onion and 1/2 slices of bacon .

Ingredients: 1 pound chicken breast, 1/4 cup coconut milk, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 tablespoon curry powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons of sugar, 1 teaspoons of curry powder and 1 teaspoon of salt . 1 teaspoon garam masala seasoning . 1 tablespoon of salt per serving of curry paste, 1 tablespoons of sugar per serving .
